div.head: 水穀不消
div.div: water and grain failing to dissolve

bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

entry.def: water and grain failing to dissolve

sense.def: Alternative Names shui gu bu hua 水谷不化 , water and grain failing to transform. Illness Sign of aqueous stools mixed with undigested food. Qian jin bei ji fang 千金備急方 13: 瀉心湯，治老小下 痢，水穀不消，腸中雷鳴 , “The ‘decoction to drain the heart’ cures discharge with free-flux illness of old and young patients, water and grain failing to dissolve , thunder-like sounds in the intestines”.
